website_summaries.verdict: Simple storage cubbies are a useful addition to any classroom.
pros: Spacious cubbies ideal for storing books, toys, art projects and more
cons: Shelf inserts are on the thinner side

customer_reviews.title: ... have purchased 2 ECR bookshelves and think they are great. HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 ECR bookshelves and think they are great. HOWEVER, when I received this storage cubby a few days ago, I cannot get over how bad it smells. As soon as I opened the box, it made my whole house REEK of what I can only describe as PAINT THINNER like fumes. It was SO strong and I cannot believe this is Greenguard Certified. The #1 reason I buy this brand is because they claim that their products are "better for air quality" and safer as far as chemical content is concerned. This product really makes me question their reliability.
customer_reviews.author: MsJD

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I had this cabinet shipped to my daughter for my grandson. She said it definitely is very well made and had no issues putting it together. The only thing she was disappointed in (not the sellers fault--we should have measured to make sure) is it is not as large as she thought. It is replacing the type of bins that are slanted and is made of plastic. She sent me pics of it put together & my grandson fussing over it, so if he likes it that is a plus to me. I will definitely be ordering other items from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy shelf supports—spend more and get more
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my classroom needed to be minimal as it is used for hybrid model learning. My class funds weren’t huge so I knew I wouldn’t be getting solid wood cubbies. These cannot fit personal white boards (across), pocket file folders, or our textbooks. Unfortunately these have flimsy shelf liners that pull out (and fall in) when my students get their very limited supplies from the cubby storage. My students’ families were generous enough to help me buy these. The cubbies do the job of taking up less space but I don’t think they’re worth the price sacrifice.
customer_reviews.author: CA Soccer Mom

customer_reviews.title: A superior product - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my home office to organize my life. It works for me. Easy to put together by one person although the instructions recommend two. Excellent, easy to follow instructions, by the way. Holes are pre drilled perfectly. Parts are assembled with hex screws and cam post locks. Light color is traditional elementary school classroom and it's laminated. Heavy but rolls easily. Comes in two boxes. I received this item in two days from ordering. Amazon and UPS were at the top of their game on this one.
customer_reviews.author: delphinabird

customer_reviews.title: perfect for homeschool supplies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after searching all over for a simple organizer for our homeschool learning and building toys. I do wish the cubbies were slightly larger but as it, it fits perfectly where I wanted it. I put most of it together alone, my husband only called it a p.o.s. once while we were working together and that says something about how easy the assembly was😄
customer_reviews.author: mama2E

customer_reviews.title: Cost doesn't align with the craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: For the wood quality/craftsmanship, it is over priced. For 3$00+ I was thinking it would be a high quality wood piece similar to a sofa table, end table, coffee table. Now that I own it for our small business, I wouldn't have paid more then 150-175.00 for it. You may be better off having a handyman or wood-craftsman make something of better quality and go purchase the cubby boxes through amazon, Walmart or storage store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It would be relatively easy to assemble except for the fact that the printed instructions were incorrect. Also, you may well need sandpaper, silicone lubricant and a rubber mallet to get the backing pieces assembled. Customer service e-mail address is nonfunctional. Product is not particularly well made. Best thing about it are the casters. Not a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf
customer_reviews.text: Very professional play room organizer. Transparent bins are great for seeing what's in them. Durability is excellent. We've used this for 3.5 years and it's still in excellent condition. The only thing that's happened is that two of the plastic bins have cracked from kids standing on it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome storage unit. I use if for my in home daycare. It's very sturdy, easy to assemble and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Bolles

customer_reviews.title: Good, BUT
customer_reviews.text: Everything would be great if the bins had been delivered at the same time as the toddler cubbies. One of the bins was cracked and now I am short a bin and will have to pay $50 just to get different bins! I can't return the whole thing because I had already put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Hall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love ECR 4 KIDS and there brand products. Thats all I buy anymore because I know I'm getting excellent quality products. The only qualm I have with this organizer is the slats each bin sits on comes out easily. I own ECR 4 kids organizer, cubbies and foam blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Dostal

customer_reviews.title: I like it but....
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall; but one of the bins cracked on the first day. If it is to be used for kids, the bins should be a bit more sturdy. Also, on the bottom of the cabinet, one of the laminated pieces arrived unglued and broke off during construction. Again, not a huge deal; it is definately functionable, but if it is for "Kids", it should not be coming apart upon putting it together. I was thinking of buying another but am having second thoughts; for the price, it should be a bit better. Was surprised how fast it shipped. Kudos for shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy we went with the more expensive version of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy we went with the more expensive version of this that includes the bins. It was easy to assemble (did it by myself) and it fits our kids toys (cars, trains) perfectly. I like that you can see through these bins. While not as "neat" aesthetically, I like that the kids can see what they are looking for and (usually!) only take out one or two bins at a time. It is a perfect addition to our playroom and helps to keep it neat and organized.
customer_reviews.author: L. Reisinger

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased not 1, but 2 of these cubby shelves, and BOTH are missing the most important components! This is beyond ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: nichele smith

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled box, but being corrected.
customer_reviews.text: Received mislabeled box, therefore waiting to receive correct box from manufacturer. Product looks good so far, will be glad to raise another star or two once product had been fully received and assembled. Manufacturer seems genuinely concerned and is attempting to rectify. ---- After receiving correct boxes. The product is of high quality. Only concern is kids climbing on 1/4 inch plywood. Otherwise, it's a solid plywood unit. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! There  are no instructions and no screws:(
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! I never expected to receive a product of this caliber with no assembling instructions and no screw kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: We received the wrong item, and when we opened it to see if we could work with it, there were a lot of missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Gzz.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not easy, but well worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my classroom and I love it. I wish the cubbies were just a little wider, but it makes organizing the students work easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Loveday

customer_reviews.title: Two terrible experiences with this company
customer_reviews.text: Two terrible experiences with this company. My original order arrived missing 3 major components and the hardware. I returned the product and ordered an exact replacement. My second order arrived and it was the wrong model! Totally incompetent company. A real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Particle board and balsa wood
customer_reviews.text: Essentially particle board and balsa wood but overall sturdy and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Jason D. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Very very bad!!
customer_reviews.text: Very very bad !!! Poor packing... missing item ..there was no balt & nut .. only 10 pc wood...😡😡 I don’t like this at all
customer_reviews.author: Tae Heui Han

customer_reviews.title: This product is a wonderful addition to my daughter's Special Needs classroom
customer_reviews.text: This product is a wonderful addition to my daughter's Special Needs classroom. She purchased plastic bins with lids and came up with 25 activities for her students. The children choose 3 bins per day and complete the tasks inside the bin. The cubby is well built, was easy to put together and comes with rollers so it can be easily moved around the room if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Birch Cubbie
customer_reviews.text: Cubbies are spacious holds enough shoes for the six of us. Looks nice .
customer_reviews.author: LacrosseD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 10 cubby cabinet to organize my kids school clothes for during the week and it works beautifully. This was exactly what I was looking for. Now getting my kids ready for school is stress free.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Schuerman

customer_reviews.title: Love this one
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. I have the clear containers to help my little boy find his toys. Keeps toys organized. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia N. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!  Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We use this piece in the bottom of our front hall closet for shoes and it is perfect! 2 pairs of kids shoes for in each slot or one pair of adult shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful piece of furniture. Exactly what I was looking for for my center. Solid wood. Took two of us to put it together but only took about half an hour. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product! We purchased two and one was missing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We purchased two and one was missing some parts. Customer service was great. No complaints except waiting for parts
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: If you need something durable use ECR4kids products
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful worth every pennie. Great product. I use this in my preschool room helped storage and organize all activities of the month. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best invention ever for kids ! Only problem is that it is smaller than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: ljclapper

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Useful, Spacious Cubby Storage Unit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition, easily assembled (takes some time, but didn't find it challenging), instructions are clear enough, received all necessary parts and materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kavita

customer_reviews.title: Almost but not quite...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed with the height of this shelf, I expected it to be taller and the cubby containers, bigger. It did have a pretty easy installation tho and was not too heavy. All in all its a good buy, serves its purpose and keeps my center's potty area very neat and organized!
customer_reviews.author: New Life Early Leaning Center

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to organize the kids play room. It works great and was easy to assemble. The kids labeled the bins and put their toys in them. The play room has never looked this good!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Cubbie holes are small
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but the cubbie holes are a tad smaller than I expected, even though I measured first.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing cabinet! I have purchased 3 in different sizes
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cabinet! I have purchased 3 in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase for our preschool. I will be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Deegan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy w a good design.  solid quality assurance measures being used in construction.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together w an electric screwdriver with special square head..... else; plan on a bit more time. Sturdy once constructed. Well designed but use common sense on putting pieces together. If it doesn't seem right, it isnt' (we are talking which side of which board to screw in. Sum of the parts makes a good investment. Read the dimensions: will accept 8x11 notebook paper and not much of anything else larger. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE S

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Quality is sturdy and well made! I was psyched to read it was made in SanDiego ,Ca.Not from China or some other swet shop.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Metz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is working out great in my 1st grade classroom. Quick delivery and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: Works for us.
customer_reviews.text: Works great- we are using as a shoe storage. Easy to assemble and does what we had hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Horrible to put together...good thing my husband is good with tools!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet. Wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: We thought this 10 whole cubby was a lot taller than it actually is. Perhaps i is our fault because we had looked so long for something that LOOKED and functioned just like this, that we paid no attention to the fact that the title said ECR 4KIDS. We don't have any LITTLE kids anymore. We're using it but when it was put together finally, in my husband's office, the height was a big surprise and disappointment. We willl be more careful next time and not just go on sight.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was prompt. The packaging was protective and the items arrived undamaged. The quality was better than expected for the price. I had a problem with a small piece of hardware but one email to customer service and it was resolved and a new part sent to me. Very professional. I am very pleased and if I need any other children's furniture, I will be sure to check this company first.
customer_reviews.author: Tsk

product_meta.title: ECR4Kids Birch 10 Cubby Tray Cabinet, Home or School Storage Organizer, Durable Birch Hardwood, Heavy-Duty Mobile Caster Wheels, GREENGUARD [GOLD] Certified, CPSIA-Compliant, Rolling Storage
product_meta.description: Size:10 Cubbies| Style:Bins Not Included| Color:Birch FinishThe Birch 10 Cubby Cabinet is a favorite for classroom, home, and office organization! Birch hardwood cabinets keep toys, art supplies, and games neatly organized and stored away when not in use. Our storage organizer cabinets are available in a variety of sizes, with casters included for optional mobility. Each cubby measures 9” x 12” x 6.75” and is perfect for commercial use, playroom storage, homeschooling, organizing personal items, homework, art supplies, toys, and keeping games neatly organized and stored away—yet easy to spot and accessible when you need them. The ECR4Kids storage organizer is GREENGUARD [GOLD] Certified because we believe kids deserve the very best. Products that have achieved GREENGUARD certification are scientifically proven to meet some of the world’s most rigorous third-party chemical emissions standards. Our cubbies are safety-tested to ensure safe learning and CPSIA (Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act) compliance. We adhere to strict safety regulations that ensure your child’s wellbeing. ECR4Kids is committed to enhancing education in the classroom and at home. We specialize in a wide range of high-quality educational furniture and supplies. We’re your partner for pre-K and beyond
feature_bullets: ORGANIZE YOUR SPACE: This ECR4Kids storage organizer is designed to make your life easier and more organized. For use in daycares, preschool, or at home, this durable birch hardwood storage cabinet with 10 compartments provides plenty of storage space

DURABLE HARDWOOD: Our Birch 10 Cubby Tray Cabinet storage organizer is made from durable hardwood with an attractive, smooth, and natural wood finish. It’s sturdy, yet lightweight when empty, so it can easily be relocated. Adult assembly required

ABUNDANT STORAGE: The spacious cubbies have room for lots of toys, puzzles, games, classroom supplies, art materials, or just your 8 1/12” X 11” reams of colored paper. You can also use it to organize shoes or purses at home

READY TO ROLL: Includes 4 heavy-duty mobile casters that can be installed for effortless mobility. No need to fear your cubby cabinet being permanently stuck in one position once all the cubbies are filled. Pair perfectly with ECR4Kids Scoop Front Bins
CERTIFIED SAFE: Our furniture is GREENGUARD [GOLD] Certified for healthier indoor air, TSCA, CARB Phase 2, Lacey Act, Prop 65 and CPSIA-compliant. Made with non-toxic, BPA-free, lead-free materials
